name: Arcade Sundown
description:
Plunge into the world of Arcade Sundown, a lilliputian pinball dribbler where you are shrunk down and run around with a pinball in lively, short matches.

HOW TO PLAY

Points are collected by maintaining possession of the ball. Once the ball is in hand the multiplier starts — keep it going by traveling around the arena and up through the ramps. When you feel the time is right (or you can’t stand the pressure any longer) clock in your points by scoring a goal.

DEFEAT THE MACHINE... AND ITS MINIONS

In single-player mode, your opponents will be bent on overtaking possession and blocking your goals. Use your wits to evade them. Brute force in the form of tackles and grabs works too.

WHOLE DIFFERENT BALL GAMES

The nature of the ball changes with the game mode, opening up whole new styles of play. In Runner mode, the ball has legs and will walk towards your goals. In Pinball mode, you’ll be contending with gravity. In Radio mode, you can freakishly steer the ball from across the board.

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS OR STRANGERS

Battle players across the world for coveted high score titles. You can also play Arcade Sundown locally with friends! Customize according to the squad’s preference — play for points or for goals — and go head to head in 2v2 teams mode or in a classic free-for-all.

JOIN THE DEVS!

Come hang out on our Discord, where we chat about the game, announce tournaments, and generally have a nice time.
